tool_description: API to get the latest details about CS2 items such as lowest price, highest buy order, and the profit you would make if you were to buy it for the highest buy order price and sell it for the lowest price, as well as other details from the steam market.
name: CsStonks
title: CsStonks

api_list.name: Get all items by name
api_list.description: Return all available CS2 skins by the weapon/skins name from the steam market at this moment.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://csstonks.p.rapidapi.com/get-all-skins/Glock-18"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "csstonks.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://csstonks.p.rapidapi.com/get-all-skins/{item_name}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "csstonks.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get item details
api_list.description: Return cs2 item details for a specific item by item name

required_parameters.name: item_name
required_parameters.description: The item name from the steam market

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://csstonks.p.rapidapi.com/get-item-details/AK-47 | Phantom Disruptor (Minimal Wear)"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "csstonks.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
